Qolmat API

Classes

imputations.rpca.rpca.RPCA([n_rows, ...])

This class is the root class of the RPCA methods.

imputations.rpca.pcp_rpca.PcpRPCA([n_rows, ...])

This class implements the basic RPCA decomposition using Alternating Lagrangian Multipliers.

imputations.rpca.temporal_rpca.TemporalRPCA([...])

This class implements a noisy version of the so-called improved RPCA

imputations.rpca.temporal_rpca.OnlineTemporalRPCA([...])

This class implements an online version of Temporal RPCA that processes one sample per time instance and hence its memory cost is independent of the number of samples It is based on stochastic optimization of an equivalent reformulation of the batch TemporalRPCA

imputations.rpca.graph_rpca.GraphRPCA([...])

This class implements Fast Robust PCA on Graphs using the FISTA algorithm

Utils

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.get_period(signal)

Retrieve the "period" of a series based on the ACF, in an optional given range.

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.signal_to_matrix(...)

Reshape a time series into a 2D array

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.approx_rank(M)

Estimate a superior rank of a matrix M by SVD

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.proximal_operator(U, ...)

Compute the proximal operator with L1 norm

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.soft_thresholding(X, ...)

Apply the shrinkage operator (i.e.

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.svd_thresholding(X, ...)

Apply the shrinkage operator to the singular values obtained from the SVD of X.

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.ortho_proj(M, omega)

Orthogonal projection of matrix M onto the linear space of matrices supported on omega

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.toeplitz_matrix(T, ...)

Create a matrix Toeplitz matrix H to take into account temporal correlation via HX H=Toeplitz(0,1,-1), in which the central diagonal is defined as ones and the T upper diagonal is defined as minus ones.

imputations.rpca.utils.utils.construct_graph(X)

Construct a graph based on the distance (similarity) between data

imputations.rpca.utils.drawing.plot_matrices(...)

Plot RPCA matrices

imputations.rpca.utils.drawing.plot_signal(...)

Plot RPCA results for time series

imputations.rpca.utils.drawing.plot_images(M, ...)

Plot multiple images in 3 columns for original, background and "foreground"
